location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: 'SKETCH ILLUSTRATING S.E. FRONTIER OF SAUDI ARABIA'

physicalDescription.extent: Materials: copy of a manuscript original; ink on paper.Dimensions: 201 x 325mm.

mods.abstract: Sketch map illustrating the disputed south-eastern frontier of Saudi Arabia, appended to a Foreign Office memorandum. The map features three boundaries, which are labelled as the following: the boundary claimed by Saudi Arabia, the Ottoman boundary, and the boundary offered to the Saudis by the British Government in 1937.
